## Canadian zone data web scraper

See [Canadian zone data web scraper · Issue #1 · BenioffOceanInitiative/ws-sql](https://github.com/BenioffOceanInitiative/ws-sql/issues/1)

```{r}
library(geojsonsf)
library(here)
library(sf)

ply_geojson <- here("data/nis.ccg-gcc.gc.ca_NAVWARNs.geojson")
ply <- geojson_sf(ply_geojson)
ply <- sf::read_sf(ply_geojson)
```

Above doesn't work because not true GeoJSON.
